name: Announce
description: Change settings for level up announcement messages.
usage: Set amount of seconds to wait before deleting announcement. Set to 0 for announcement not to be deleted.
Set the description for the embed/message.
Test the announce for a specific level or the global announce.
Set the channel announcements should be sent to.
Set how announcements should be sent when a user levels up.
Get a list of variables for announcements.

name: Badge
description: Add/remove custom badges from the server.
usage: Add a new badge to the server.
Delete a current badge from the server.
Show a list of the available badges in this server.

name: Blacklist
description: Blacklist channels/roles from gaining exp.
usage: Adds/removes a text channel to the text blacklist.
Adds/removes a role to the text blacklist.
Adds/removes a voice channel to the voice blacklist.
Adds/removes a role to the voice blacklist.
Shows a list of currently blacklisted roles and channels.

name: Bug
description: Report a bug to developers

name: Config
description: Configure various settings for the server.
usage: Set if voting expbooster should be enabled/disabled.
Set an admin role for the server. Members with this role can config the bot.
Set the background for the leaderboard image.
Set the amount of users shown on the leaderboard.
Set the color for the leaderboard.
Set if leaderboard should be an embed or an image.
Set the opacity for the leaderboard image.
Set the overlay for the leaderboard image.
Set the theme for the leaderboard image.
Set the max level users can achieve in this server.

name: Cooldown
description: Change global cooldown or for channels/roles.
usage: Set cooldown for a text/voice channel.
Set cooldown for a role in text/voice.
Remove cooldown from a text/voice channel.
Show a list of the currently set cooldowns.

name: Dm
description: Enable/disable dms from Kyubot for announcements in all servers
usage: Enable/disable dms from Kyubot for announcements in all servers.

name: Donate
description: Donate to unlock extra features
usage: Find out information about how to donate.

name: Embed
description: Change settings for announcements.
usage: Set amount of seconds to wait before deleting announcement. Set to 0 for announcement not to be deleted.
Create a custom embed for a specific level.
Customise different sections for the announcement message.

/embed customise title <input> [level]
/embed customise description <input> [level]
/embed customise image <input> [level]
/embed customise color <input> [level]
Delete a custom embed for a specific level.
Test the announce for a specific level or the global announce.
Set if announcement should be sent as an embed or message.
Set the channel announcements should be sent to.
Set how announcements should be sent when a user levels up.
Get a list of variables for announcements.

name: Goodbye
description: Change settings for when users leave the guild.
usage: Change setting for exp to be cleared upon user leaving.

name: Help
description: Information about the available commands
usage: Get information about a specific command.

name: Ignore
description: Ignore channels/commands when they are ran.
usage: Adds/removes a channel to the ignored list.
Adds/removes a command to the ignored list.
Shows a list of currently ignored commands and channels.

name: Import
description: Import levels from various other bots into Kyubot.
usage: Import levels from various other bots into Kyubot.

name: Invite
description: Get a link to add KyuBot to your server.
usage: Get a link to add KyuBot to your server.

name: Koth
description: A temporary leaderboard, which allows the top member to earn different rewards.
usage: Set a reward for the top member of the koth leaderbaord.
Shows the koth leaderboard for the server.

name: Language
description: Change the bots default language.
usage: Change the bots default language by selecting one of the options.

name: Leaderboard
description: Shows the different leaderboards for the server.
usage: Shows the leaderboard for the server.

name: Lootbox
description: Open lootboxes to earn extra exp.
usage: Open a lootbox to earn extra exp and other rewards.
Disable/enable ability for members to open lootboxes (Admins only).
Check your current statistics for lootboxes.

name: Modifyexp
description: Add/remove specific amount of exp from members.
usage: Reward users with a specific amount of exp.
Remove a specific amount of exp from a user.

name: Multiplier
description: Set multiplier for channels/roles.
usage: Set multiplier for a text/voice channel.
Set multiplier for a role in text/voice list.
Delete multiplier for a text/voice channel.
Delete multiplier for a role in text/voice list.
Shows a list of current multiplier roles and channels.

name: Profile
description: Change your rank card appearance.
usage: Change the color for your rank card.
Change the opacity for your rank card.
Change the background for your rank card.
Change the overlay for your rank card.

name: Rank
description: Check your rank or another user's rank
usage: Check your rank or another user's rank.

name: Reset
description: Reset specific users or settings for the current server.
usage: Reset specific settings for the current server.

name: Rewards
description: Change settings for rewards earned upon leveling up.
usage: Set role to be given when a member reaches the specified level.
Remove role from be given at a specified level.
Set roles to be stacked or replaced after gaining new role.
Shows all roles set to levels.

name: Setlevel
description: Set a member's level or level for member's who have a specific role.
usage: Set member to a specified level.
Update level for all member who have a specific role.

name: Settings
description: Check the current server settings.

name: Stats
description: Check the current server settings.

name: Support
description: Get a link to join the support server.
usage: Get a link to join the support server.

name: Voice
description: Change settings for voice exp.
usage: Enable voice leveling system for the server.
Disable voice leveling system for the server.
Shows the voice leaderboard for the server.
Show a list of the currently blacklisted channels/roles.

name: Vote
description: Get a link to vote for KyuBot
usage: Get a link to vote for KyuBot.

name: Welcome
description: Change settings for when users joins the server.
usage: Set a role for users to gain upon joinging the server.
Disable settings for users to gain a role upon joining.
